channel.title: Client freeze = not save HELP ME
channel.description:
Okay then lets get started....
when people are on my server, everythings going fine
then sometimes there client freezes or something
i'm wondering, 1) how do i make it save there file when they get disconected OR 2) where's the place where it controls wat happens when there client freezes?

item.title: Client freeze = not save HELP ME
item.dc:creator: @Avalon Avalon
item.description:
@Avalon wrote:

silabgarza:

avalan, i want it to save there character if they get disconected…

Oh, I guess I’m overcomplicating things a bit…

Possibly in the destruct() method? I’ll take a more thorough look in a minute.

Ninja’d.

Read full topic
item.source: Client freeze = not save HELP ME

item.title: Client freeze = not save HELP ME
item.dc:creator: @Avalon Avalon
item.description:
@Avalon wrote:

It’s caused by an exception which was most likely thrown because of some logic error on the client. I’m not exactly sure how you would be able to save a character file through a client, though.
